actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Natural Resources Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Natural Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to waive the Congressional review period required by Section 28 (w)(2) of the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, for the creation of an easement for private construction on certain federal lands in Massachusetts.

summary.text: Waives the congressional review period required by the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 for a certain underground natural gas pipeline to be constructed by Tennessee Gas Pipeline Company across specified Army Corps of Engineers lands in Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to waive the Congressional review period required by Section 28 (w)(2) of the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, for the creation of an easement for private construction on certain federal lands in Massachusetts.
